column4: I downloaded .NET from the microsoft site, and when I try to use WINE with it its not working
any support
Try #winehq
what does logmein do?
that's an activeX control I believe.  So you won't be able to do that.  Luckily, Linux provides many other options ot login to remote PCs
are you there?
I am
that's what I said.
there are a few methods, VNC, RDP.  RDP requires no additional software on windows.
could you give me a wiki or something to set one of them up
Unfortunately no.  there doesn't seem to be anything in the wiki about it.  You might search the forums, if not there, google.
Here's stuff for VN
VNC: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=454735&highlight=Remote+Desktop+Windows
Don't chmod it, just become super user to add the stuff.
Whats wrong with the flash from the repositories?
Every single time I run flash, firefox crashes, so doesnt all other browsers
You've been given the answer multiple times.  Please stop.
NOBODY will explain to me what exactly to do!!
`which firefox`
We've told you.  `which firefox` will give you the path.  Please stop asking.
You're not listening.  We can't help you if you refuse to cooperate.  `which firefox` will give you the path of your FF, which you can then give the installer.
In any terminal.
I put 'which firefox' into a new terminal, it gave me a path, I entered the path on the installer, and it said this: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/23677/
it's looking for just the directory.  Not the file.  You want simply /usr/bin it seems.
